column2: SELECT *, clientId() AS clientId, timestamp() AS timestamp FROM 'chat/out'
[{u'KeyType': u'HASH', u'AttributeName': u'room'}, {u'KeyType': u'RANGE', u'AttributeName': u'timestamp'}]
[{u'AttributeName': u'room', u'AttributeType': u'S'}, {u'AttributeName': u'timestamp', u'AttributeType': False}]

[{u'Action': u'sts:AssumeRoleWithWebIdentity', u'Effect': u'Allow', u'Condition': {u'StringEquals': {u'cognito-identity.amazonaws.com:aud': u'ChatIdentityPool'}}, u'Principal': {u'Federated': u'cognito-identity.amazonaws.com'}}]

[{u'PolicyName': u'CognitoUnauthenticatedPolicy', u'PolicyDocument': {u'Version': u'2012-10-17', u'Statement': [{u'Action': u'iot:Connect', u'Resource': [u'*'], u'Effect': u'Allow'}, {u'Action': u'iot:Publish', u'Resource': [u'arn:aws:iot:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:topic/chat/out', u'arn:aws:iot:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:topic/chat/stream'], u'Effect': u'Allow'}, {u'Action': u'iot:Subscribe', u'Resource': [u'arn:aws:iot:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:topicfilter/chat/in/*', u'arn:aws:iot:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:topicfilter/chat/pub/*'], u'Effect': u'Allow'}, {u'Action': u'iot:Receive', u'Resource': [u'arn:aws:iot:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:topic/chat/in/*', u'arn:aws:iot:${AWS::Region}:${AWS::AccountId}:topic/chat/pub/*'], u'Effect': u'Allow'}]}}]
